Mini-equipment for big tasks! Reliable. Profitable. Fast

Mini tractors and excavators for work in the field and at construction sites. We deliver all over the country!"
Get a consultation

What do we offer?

Warranty and service

Official warranty and professional service. We work only with proven spare parts.

Shipping all over Australia

Fast and reliable delivery to any point in the country. We will organize the transportation of equipment directly to you.

The best prices for equipment

Direct deliveries from manufacturers allow us to offer competitive prices without unnecessary markups.

Spare parts and accessories

In stock and on order – everything necessary for repair and modernization of equipment.

Leasing and convenient payment

Flexible payment options: leasing, installments, payment in parts. We will find a solution for each client.

Consultation before purchase

We help you choose the equipment for your tasks. We will explain what is right for you!

About Us

We sell and supply mini equipment throughout Australia, helping private and commercial customers find reliable equipment for their field and construction work.

We work directly with manufacturers, which allows us to offer competitive prices and an official guarantee.

Equipment delivery is carried out throughout the country, regardless of your location.

We service and repair equipment quickly, efficiently and using only original spare parts.

Come visit us!
